pr_title: DROOLS-5299 DMN strongly typed javadoc/file comment disclaimer

timeline.message: DROOLS-5299 DMN strongly typed javadoc/file comment disclaimer

timeline.bodyText: as the message is similar, can't we put it in a single method? I wouldn't want to change it in three places
timeline.author: lucamolteni

replies.bodyText:
the part which is actually indeed the same, is already factored out.
But the messages are different.
replies.author: tarilabs

replies.bodyText: nevermind, there is no way to keep this message and please SonarCloud, refactoring..
replies.author: tarilabs
